original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṁ aññatarassa pūgassa saṅghassa sacīvarabhattaṁ paṭiyattaṁ hoti—
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyam aññatarassa pūgassa saṅghassa sa cīvara bhattam paṭiyattam hoti

original: Atha kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū yena so pūgo tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
analyzed: atha kho chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū yena saḥ pūgaḥ tena upasaṅkamisu
detha āvusaḥ amhākam imāni cīvarāni iti
amhākam saṅghassa anuvassam sa cīvara bhikkhā paññattā ti

original: “Bahū, āvuso, saṅghassa dāyakā, bahū saṅghassa bhattā.
analyzed: bahū āvuso saṅghassa dāyakāḥ bahū saṅghassa bhattā

original: Mayaṁ tumhe nissāya tumhe sampassantā idha viharāma.
analyzed: mayam tumhe nissāya tumhe sampassantāḥ idha viharāma

original: Tumhe ce amhākaṁ na dassatha, atha ko carahi amhākaṁ dassati?
analyzed: tumhe ce amhākam na dassatha atha kaḥ carahi amhākam dassati
detha āvusaḥ amhākam imāni cīvarāni iti

original: Atha kho so pūgo chabbaggiyehi bhikkhūhi nippīḷiyamāno yathāpaṭiyattaṁ cīvaraṁ chabbaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ datvā saṅghaṁ bhattena parivisi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ pūgaḥ chabbaggiyehi bhikkhūhi nippīḍiyamānaḥ yathāpaṭiyattam cīvaram chabbaggiyānam bhikkhūnam datvā saṅgham bhattena parivisi

original: Ye te bhikkhū jānanti saṅghassa sacīvarabhattaṁ paṭiyattaṁ, na ca jānanti chabbaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ dinnanti, te evamāhaṁsu—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū jānanti saṅghassa sa cīvara bhattam na ca jānanti chabbaggiyānam bhikkhūnam dinnanti te evam āhasu

original: Yathāpaṭiyattaṁ cīvaraṁ ayyā chabbaggiyā attano pariṇāmesun”ti.
analyzed: yathāpaṭiyattam cīvaram ayyāḥ chabbaggiyāḥ attano pariṇāmesunti

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmessantī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū jānam saṅghikam lābham pariṇatam attanaḥ pariṇāmessanti iti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmethā”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave jānam saṅghikam lābham pariṇatam attanaḥ pariṇāmetha ati

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmessatha.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tumhe mogha purisāḥ jānam saṅghikam lābham pariṇatam attano pariṇāmessatha
neta moghapurisāḥ appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmeyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu jānam saṅghikam lābham pariṇatam attanaḥ pariṇāmeyya nissaggiyam pācittiyan ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: sāmaṁ vā jānāti aññe vā tassa ārocenti so vā āroceti.
analyzed: sāmam vā jānāti aññe vā tassa ārocenti saḥ vā āroceti
cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhārāḥ antamasaḥ cuṇṇa piṇḍaḥ api danta kaṭṭham pi dasika suttam pi
dassāma karissāma ati vācā bhinnā hoti

original: Nissajjitabbaṁ saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
analyzed: nissajjitabbam saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā

original: “idaṁ me, bhante, jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmitaṁ nissaggiyaṁ.
analyzed: idam me bhante jānam saṅghikam lābham pariṇatam attano pariṇāmitam
imā aham saṅghassa nissajjāmi iti pe

original: Pariṇate pariṇatasaññī attano pariṇāmeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: pariṇate pariṇata saññī attanaḥ pariṇāmeti nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: Pariṇate vematiko attano pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: pariṇate vematikaḥ attanaḥ pariṇāmeti āpatti dukkaṭassa
pariṇate a pariṇata saññī attanaḥ pariṇāmeti anāpatti

original: Saṅghassa pariṇataṁ aññasaṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: saṅghassa pariṇatam añña saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Cetiyassa pariṇataṁ aññacetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: cetiyassa pariṇatam añña cetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Puggalassa pariṇataṁ aññapuggalassa vā saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: puggalassa pariṇatam añña puggalassa vā saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti āpatti dukkaṭassa
a pariṇate pariṇata saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: kattha demāti pucchiyamāno yattha tumhākaṁ deyyadhammo paribhogaṁ vā labheyya paṭisaṅkhāraṁ
analyzed: kattha dema iti pucchiyamānaḥ yattha tumhākam paribhogam vā labheyya paṭisaṅkhāra

original: vā labheyya ciraṭṭhitiko vā assa yattha vā pana tumhākaṁ cittaṁ pasīdati tattha dethāti bhaṇati,
analyzed: vā labheyya ciraṭṭhitikaḥ vā assa yattha vā pana tumhākam cittam pasīdati tattha detha iti bhaṇati

original: “Uddiṭṭhā kho, āyasmanto, tiṁsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā dhammā.
analyzed: uddiṭṭhāḥ kho āyasmanto tisa nissaggiyāḥ pācittiyāḥ dhammāḥ
